Theme: Main issue/topic (e.g., "Training Pace Too Fast", "Need More Practice")
Frequency: How many times this theme appears across feedback
Priority Score: Calculated importance (1-100, based on frequency + sentiment)
Sentiment: Average sentiment when this theme appears (Positive/Negative)
Owner: Who's responsible for addressing this theme

Recommended Actions: Extend training duration, add practice sessions
Continue current approach, document best practices
